name: telegram-media-deleter-bot
description: A Telegram bot that deletes media in groups after a delay.

API_ID.description: Optional Telegram API ID (if you want it saved)

API_HASH.description: Optional Telegram API HASH (if you want it saved)

OWNER_ID.description: Your Telegram user id (owner). Used for /broadcast (integer).

MONGO_URI.description: MongoDB connection string (e.g. from MongoDB Atlas)

SUPPORT_GROUP_URL.description: URL to your Support Group (like https://t.me/yourgroup)

DEFAULT_DELAY.description: Default deletion delay in seconds (300 = 5 minutes).
